creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom
inscription:
Signature; Date; Title; Inscription

Dated and inscribed, verso: [Dogtown 1934 No 16 S-337 RC-10297]
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
provenance: Estate of the artist, 1943; (Babcock Galleries, New York, until 1957, sold to Hillstrom); Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, St. Paul, 1957-93 (RLH 103); given to MIA, 1993.
title: Landscape with Fence Posts and Rocks (Dogtown Common)
